CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Eligible for Acquisition stage positioned above or below the Approved for Exhibition stage?
SRP.A: The Eligible for Acquisition stage is positioned {below} the Approved for Exhibition stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Shortlisted for Acquisition?
VE.A: The value of stage Shortlisted for Acquisition is {50%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Displayed in Exhibition?
VE.A: The value of stage Displayed in Exhibition is {75%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Approved for Exhibition, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Eligible for Acquisition, with a value of {30%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Shortlisted for Acquisition to stage Eligible for Acquisition?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Shortlisted for Acquisition to stage Eligible for Acquisition is {20%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Approved for Exhibition to stage Displayed in Exhibition?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Approved for Exhibition to stage Displayed in Exhibition is {25%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 40%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Approved for Exhibition} stage has {100%}, the {Displayed in Exhibition} stage has {75%}, the {Shortlisted for Acquisition} stage has {50%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 87%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Displayed in Exhibition} stage has {75%}, the {Shortlisted for Acquisition} stage has {50%}, the {Eligible for Acquisition} stage has {30%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 40% and 87%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Displayed in Exhibition} stage has {75%}, the {Shortlisted for Acquisition} stage has {50%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Displayed in Exhibition to Shortlisted for Acquisition, or from stage Approved for Exhibition to Displayed in Exhibition?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Displayed in Exhibition} to {Shortlisted for Acquisition} is equal to the reduction from stage Approved for Exhibition to Displayed in Exhibition.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Shortlisted for Acquisition to Eligible for Acquisition, from stage Approved for Exhibition to Displayed in Exhibition, or from stage Displayed in Exhibition to Shortlisted for Acquisition?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {Shortlisted for Acquisition} to {Eligible for Acquisition}, {Approved for Exhibition} to {Displayed in Exhibition}, and {Displayed in Exhibition} to {Shortlisted for Acquisition} are equal.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Approved for Exhibition} and {Displayed in Exhibition} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Shortlisted for Acquisition} and {Eligible for Acquisition} stages.
